release.action: Added hasPROPERTY
All generated classes now implement RDF2Go Resource and delegate to the instanceResource
Base.deleteInstance now deletes only the given rdf:type.
Heavy refactoring. Now all is based only on Base, ReactorEntity and ReactorResult.
Upgrade to RDF2Go 4.5.3
Added Base, a lightweight runtime base with static methods.
Added ResourceConverter
Added static RDFSChema wrapper classes (named "statik")
Migration to rdfgo.impl.base 4.4.9
Fixed a bug with converting Booleans and URLs
Fixed a bug with null values
Refactored type conversion: Now pluggable converters can be used. Code cleaner!
Now return null, if no value is found instead of an RDFDataException.
Added support for handling primitive types Byte, Boolean, Double, Float.
Fixed handling of conversion Calendar -- xsd:dateTime.
Switched to slf4j for logging.
Removed support for using an RDFReactor object as a java.util.Map.
Aligned to RDF2Go releaes 4.4.5.
Implemented support for delete()
Split RDFReactor into two OSGi bundles
